===Etymology===
From {{der|ja|sort=とけい|lzh|土圭}}, which is a [[sundial]] used in the [[w:Zhou Dynasty|Zhou Dynasty]]{{rfv-etymology|ja}}. The kanji are {{juku|sort=とけい}}.
